subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With all the drama at Yankees camp, Carlos Beltrán addressed Mets business — like the tough words from the Phillies’ Cole Hamels this off-season and Manager Jerry Manuel’s talk of a reshuffled lineup.
snippet: With all the drama at Yankees camp, Carlos Beltrán addressed Mets business — like the tough words from the Phillies’ Cole Hamels this off-season and Manager Jerry Manuel’s talk of a reshuffled lineup.
